name: ormEvictCollection
description: This will remove all the entries with the specified relation/collection name in the specified component.

params.name: entityName
params.description: Entity name of the persistent CFC

params.name: collectionName
params.description: Name of the collection in the component

params.name: primaryKey
params.description: Primary key of the collection or association data of the entity

examples.title: Tag Example
examples.description: To evict all the association or collection data of collection `arts` belonging to the component `CArtists`
